question:
The Union Budget 2017 proposed creation of:
  1. Dairy Infrastructure Development Fund
  2. Micro-irrigation fund
  3. Rail Raksha Fund
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: The Union Budget 2017 has proposed setting up of Dairy Processing Infrastructure Fund of Rs.2,000 crore which would grow to Rs.8, 000 crore in three years. The fund will enable milk cooperatives and other entities which process milk to upgrade their technology in turn directly benefitting farmers. The Budget has also proposed for setting up of Micro Irrigation Fund under the NABARD with initial corpus of Rs 5000. The Union Budget 2017 also proposed creation of the rail security fund of -1 lakh crore over the course of five year. The fund termed as Rail Raksha Fund will start with initial corpus of 20,000 crore.
